student_a.khmer: សួួស្តី។ តើអាវក្រៅនេះមានតម្លៃប៉ុន្មាន?
student_a.phonetic: Sours sdey. Ter av krav nih mean tomlai pun marn?
student_a.english: Hello. How much is this jacket?

student_a.khmer: តើអ្នកអាចចុះថ្លៃបន្តិចបានទេ?
student_a.phonetic: Ter nak ach jos thlai pun tec ban te?
student_a.english: Can you give me some discount?

student_a.khmer: អញ្ចឹងខ្ញុំយកអាវក្រៅមួយនេះ។
student_a.phonetic: Pa robos khnom chea metheavy hauy chomnaek eu mak robos khnom chea kru bongrean.
student_a.english: So I will take this jacket.

student_a.khmer: បាទ មិនអីទេ។

student_b.khmer: ចា។ អាវក្រៅនេះមានតម្លៃ ៤០០០០ រៀល។
student_b.phonetic: khnom mean bong paoun 4 neak. Bong srey 2 neak neng bong bros 1 neak. jos neak vinh?

student_b.khmer: បាន។ ខ្ញុំអាចចុះអោយអ្នក ៥០០០ រៀល។ តម្លៃសរុបគឺ ៣៥០០០ រៀល។
student_b.phonetic: Ter pa mak robous neak brokorb muk robour avey? (ter pa mak robous neak tver ey?
student_b.english: Sure. I can give 5000 riel discount. The total price is 35000 riel.

student_b.khmer: អគុណច្រើន។ ចាំខ្ញុំខ្ជប់អោយអ្នក។
student_b.phonetic: Pit man reu? Mak robous khnom kor chea kru bongrean dae.
student_b.english: Thank you so much. I will pack it for you.
